website_summaries.verdict: This compact and durable speaker comes with a surprisingly full-range sound.
pros: Offers wireless connection to your smartphone, tablet, or other smart devices
Voice prompts make it easy to pair with compatible devices
Users are impressed with such a good battery life for its compact size
cons: Does have some known battery issues, but only appears to affect a minority of units

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but it died after 6 uses!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, but it died after 6 uses! Fully charges, just won't power up. I returned. While I see the tricks folks are using to power it back up, I really could not be bothered to spend this kind of money and have to hope a trick works. Bose... wow, I have nothing but Bose, even in car.. who would have thought they would release such a crappy product. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Getting There

customer_reviews.title: This Bose SounLink Color Bluetooth Speaker is huge disappointment. The first one just stopped working and charging ...
customer_reviews.text: This Bose SounLink Color Bluetooth Speaker is huge disappointment. The first one just stopped working and charging after a few months, they sent me a replacement, with which I was thrilled, until it recently stopped just like the first one. That is a quality problem, not a lemon! It is now out of the 1 yr warranty so I am left with a LEMON of a BOSE! Shame on a company that sells high priced products that are actually poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Luther

customer_reviews.title: it was great WHILE IT LASTED
customer_reviews.text: originally purchased this item Jan 2016..it was great WHILE IT LASTED..today is Nov. 2017 and the soundlink will only play while plugged into wall outlet.. battery no longer accepts a charge.. understand, i am not one that leaves a charger in ALL the time.. i charge to capacity then remove the charging cord... EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED in this BOSE PRODUCT...
customer_reviews.author: GERI D

customer_reviews.title: Love the color. Hate that it doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Bose 2 years ago. I don't use it too often. So after a year, I was surprised that it started acting fussy. It would connect then disconnect with my iPad several times during my short uses....always "announcing" that I was connected or disconnected. Did not make for a pleasurable listening environment. Then I discovered that if I connect an auxiliary cable to the Bose and my iPad- I no longer get connected/disconnected. So much for the joys of wireless - but at least I could use it. Today, I discover that despite having been plugged in for some time, the battery is dead. DEAD! what a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: New Mat Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.............for a few days.
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about receiving this speaker, after I had a much cheaper bluetooth speaker finally crap out on me. I spent good money on this, and Bose is a good name, so I thought that I would be getting a quality product. As it turns out, I've had the speaker all of 10 days. It started out great, but now I can't charge the damn thing. I've read other reviews, and it seems that this is a design flaw. I'll be returning this product, and will spend my money on something else, once I get it refunded. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS SPEAKER!!!
customer_reviews.author: towesweetitis

customer_reviews.title: Hate the recharge plug, won’t charge
customer_reviews.text: From day one, Hate the plug, not a quick, easy plug in. It's hard to plug into the unit, tiny to see and now after only recharging a few times, now the charger will not work. Fix it please! Or send me one that fits! Sounds good but if I can't recharge it, what can I do? Is the outlet plug I have defective? If I keep my hand on it, sometimes it will work. Done with Bose, until they fix this problem which I guess is not unusual as I hear from their own sales people. Won’t charge after a year. Piece of junk. Never Bose again, you think it would last longer than 18 mths
customer_reviews.author: Mozartmama

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the quality of this product--only worked for 1 week and then ceased operation. i sent it as a gift and did not find out about the problem until 3 months after the purchase so not able to return it. It was not cheap so doubly disappointed. Do not think much of this bluetooth speaker and would not suggest anyone purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: B McM

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful speaker, with flaws
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, pleasant to the ears even when turned up loud. You can pause playback of your phone using the controls on the speaker, which can be very handy. Video review notes the disappointments with this unit including location of charge port and that I got only 50 cycles out of the battery before it showed significant capacity loss (8 hrs down to 4.5 hours on a full charge). It has a whopper of sound for such a small speaker. I read somewhere it was rated as a 200 watt speaker (or eqv). 4 stars because the battery loss could have been my fault, but most importantly, I love the sound!!!
customer_reviews.author: rivalry

customer_reviews.title: Nice. My buddy had one
customer_reviews.text: Nice. My buddy had one, so I heard his and liked it. Upon buying my own, there's only one minor complaint. I'm glad there's a good amount of bass in this little guy, but it's almost too much. I'd like to be able to EQ it a bit and pull a tiny bit of the bottom end out of the sound. All that being said, this thing rocks! It fills a room just like you'd expect a Bose product to! Easy to pair. Getting the cable into the charging port was slightly tricky. The outer covering of the unit is rubbery, I thought it was hard plastic, no worries though. Oh, the color IS NOT red, it's closer to coral/orange.
customer_reviews.author: Rob C.

customer_reviews.title: It's nice but if you can afford it and you really ...
customer_reviews.text: It's nice but if you can afford it and you really want to enjoy good quality get the "Bose SoundLink Mini Bluetooth Speaker II" that one it's even better. This is still nice for a small speaker but ... the other one it's awesome. We have both and the "SoundLink" rocks the entire house. This may be missing some of the quality on the low range. It's still good just not as good as the other one. I hope this hell to somebody trying to decide betteween the two as I was . ( I ended up getting both... :) )
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and sound for the value!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little gem. I take it everywhere with me.. in the shower, camping, meditating.... Still holding up great. I gave this 5 stars because the durability and the sound quality (for the price) are on point. However, I do have one complaint...when the battery is low a voice comes on to say 'battery LOW, please charge now" it is so disrupting to your music and disturbing when you are listening at low volumes because a voice just comes on quite loud with the warning... always at the same volume regardless of what listening volume it is set at. So that is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: nicole Jimmo

customer_reviews.title: My second Bose to stop charging
customer_reviews.text: I grew up believing in the Bose brand but this is my second wireless speaker that stopped charging. My first one was a Soundlink Mini that I was thankfully able to return to the store. This one stopped working about 2 months out of warranty. There are significantly cheaper speakers that last longer and sound just as good. Buyer beware, you'll end up disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MayberryInTheCity

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality...
customer_reviews.text: Love! The sound quality is awesome on this little speaker. Use it with my iPad, and what a difference in the sound. You can actually hear each instrument clearly. Bose is in my opinion the best in sound quality out there, and this little speaker is no exception. Very easy to sync with your Bluetooth devices—i Believe that you can sync it to 3 different devices if that helps. Super easy to operate, and great sound. Bought two more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: L.A.

customer_reviews.title: I said great!. Got the replacement
customer_reviews.text: The reason I only give it 3 stars is the battery. I had the speaker 6 months, and the battery died. Wouldn't charge at all. I called Bose, and I was pleasantly surprised they replaced it at no cost! I said great!. Got the replacement, but the battery in that one died in less than 6 months. Maybe I am just not lucky, but I'll never purchase a Bose Bluetooth speaker again. 2 batteries going dead before 6 months is unacceptable. it can still play, but it must be kept plugged in. Kinda defeats the purpose of a Bluetooth speaker. The sound or audio is great, just a poor battery.
customer_reviews.author: hth999

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value, superb sound quality and portability.
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best value of any Bluetooth speaker you will find out there. The bass is true and never distorts. The volume is amazing. It is worthy of the Bose brand. More things I like: It is very portable (there are some great cases for it as well if you want to carry it around) it looks cool, its very affordable, and last but not least - I have never had ANY bluetooth connection issues with this thing. It remembers a lot of devices and if they are on and nearby, it just works. No re-pairing and re-connecting, or turning your phones bluetooth off and on to get it to work. It just works.
customer_reviews.author: friendly1013

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Dead Duck
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the negative reviews more closely. In under six months, the battery kicked the bucket, so I used it plugged in. Several days later the sound began to fade in and out. So it's a dead duck--an expensive dead duck with an irreplaceable battery. In German, the word "böse" means "nasty, evil." That should have been a clue. Forewarned is forearmed.
customer_reviews.author: Viga Glum

customer_reviews.title: The speaker itself it good, but if bluetooth is not within a few ...
customer_reviews.text: The charger worked for about four months, and then I noticed the charger wasn't working anymore. It appeared that the wires for the charger wore out quickly and wouldn't work anymore. I have a charger that fits it and have been using that one. The speaker itself it good, but if bluetooth is not within a few rooms of the speaker, the sound breaks up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Conked out after minimal use.
customer_reviews.text: Had this unit just short of 3 years and it's already dead. The unit won't power on unless plugging in the charger first. Then it works. Assuming it's the power button. Its had very minimal use and I can only think of a few times that I've charged it since purchasing. However, the sound is great but takes way too long to charge. Like most Bose products, they look and sound great initially but just don't last long. Not worth the price. Just by something cheaper that's comparable and replace every few years.
customer_reviews.author: Tony W.

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy...
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at the poor quality this product ended up being and very unusual for Bose. I bought this based on more of the good reviews and the fact that Bose history and name speaks for itself... Usually. It was a Christmas gift for my husband and from the first day he used it battery was at best 2.5 hours and the volume was so low that it was difficult with other background noise to really hear it. Since I was not expecting issues the box was thrown away and there goes my return. Glad for those who had a good experience... I am not one of them and now going to spend more money on another speaker.
customer_reviews.author: MadelenaMM

customer_reviews.title: Not charging
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this speaker !! Less than six months after purchase it will no longer charge. Bose used to be a good product. No more
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice sound but needs charging.
customer_reviews.text: Sound is excellent and nice to look at, but some issues. I have difficulties with the following parts. It needs charging fairly often, but when it runs down and then is charging it does not seem to want to play. Has to be fully or almost fully charged before you can play. Struggles to find blue tooth or at least pushing the button with the Kindle and Amazon Music. If it would play well while charging and the blue tooth issues were non existant (which I dont know if it is the Kindle or Bose ) I would give it 5 stars for the sound and appearance and price.
customer_reviews.author: Ben from Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Can withstand 5am throw up and beach sand
customer_reviews.text: I've put this little trooper through a bit since I've had it. Sometimes I wish I'd spend just a bit more on a bigger and better model, but then it wouldn't be so easy to just throw in a bag for the beach or some slightly oversized purse to a party. Plus, I've thrown up on it before so while it might not be like... Waterproof or something fancy, it's absolutely able to hold up to the afterparty joys of drinking too much and still sound perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker but doesn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I've had to downgrade my rating for this speaker. After only 2 years, it's now neither holding a charge or allowing me to charge it. The charging port seems fine to the eye, but does not activate when the cable is plugged in. And it's not the cable. The cable is good. It's the speaker. Very disappointed. It lasted only 2 years, almost to the day. Great sound for its size. I'm living tiny and so gave up having a television. I watch TV and movies on my laptop, and used this speaker which delivers surprisingly high quality sound. At times the bass is a little deep, but I recognize that for its size it performs very very well.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: Cute, colorful but thats about it - thumbs down - bimbo bose has yet to impress
customer_reviews.text: the sound body, quality, and volume are not worth the high cost of this cute colored square box. I love the look, the button layout, and the rubber grips and feet but that was about the only thing I liked about it. I sold it to a friend for less than I paid for it. so far I have yet to purchase a bose product that I ended up loving. I gave their $1200 dollar Acoustic Wave System a try several years back and was too through with it, could not send the overpriced, overhyped box with lame brain name on it back fast enough. Bose has yet to impress.
customer_reviews.author: Digimortal

customer_reviews.title: High quality sound!
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this speaker by accident. I was browsing through the various portable speakers on Amazon searching for a decent one to connect my iPhone to. When I saw that Bose has one, I immediately ordered it. The speaker is small in size but HUGE in sound quality. I can hear the music through out my apartment and the quality is amazing. Bose has developed a wonderful product so if you’re searching for a portable speaker, then don’t hesitate to buy this one. The price is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Neptune_Attic

customer_reviews.title: Great quality sound production but the recharging plug-in is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sound production but the recharging plug-in is terrible!!! It stopped working properly within 2 weeks of purchase; it takes several minutes of re-positioning the power cord to get it to recharge each time recharging is required. After years of having to jiggle and reposition the recharging male plug in the back of the device, I found a replacement on Amazon and immediately ordered it. It completely corrected the problem. I have passed up purchasing several Bose devices for gifts over the last 4+ years due to the very poor quality charging cable on my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor-Don't Recommend Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker in January 2017 and in August 2017 it quit working and the batter will no longer charge and it won't work plugged in--it just quit altogether. Absolutely disappointed in this Bose product and will not recommend it. Although it worked fine for a while, there is no reason for it to have stopped working and cannot even put in a new battery. Also, did not realize (my bad) that it was "refurbished" as I would not have purchased it in used condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same as the rest...great sound, won't last
customer_reviews.text: I guess the mini-usb port just isn't the most stable or secure way to power this thing. It loosened up over time--and, admittedly, we used this thing heavily--and eventually got to the point where it wouldn't take a charge anymore. We had ours for almost three years before it quit, which seems like a good run compared to many of the other 1-star reviews, but shouldn't a product last longer than that? Maybe that's just the game with electronic devices.
customer_reviews.author: Karissa Sprinkle

customer_reviews.title: worked great.....for 9 months, then died. :(
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVED this speaker to begin with and would've given it 4-5 stars. The sound is great and it's VERY convenient and exactly what I needed.. I used it inside 95% of the time, only taking it outside 3 times and it sat in the shade. I purchased this in Dec '15 and as of Aug '16, it's DEAD. I cannot imagine something from Bose dying in 9 months. I'm very disappointed. We have other Bose speakers in the house and a pair of wireless headphones that are both GREAT, but this one just didn't make it. Sadly, I'm out of a great speaker and $100.
customer_reviews.author: ncsusan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't meet expectations for Bose brand.
customer_reviews.text: I'm thinking more like 2 1/2 stars. This is a small, flat speaker, about the size of this thick paperback (think Stephen King), but more squarish. I bought it from Amazon then returned it after listening to it. The sound isn't bad for the size, but it isn't good either. The highs and mids were present, but the lows were just a mess. It had that boxy/muddy/empty sound you'd expect from mediocre electronics from the '90s. I returned it. I ordered a Bose Soundlink III (which has *excellent* sound).
customer_reviews.author: Steve McKay

customer_reviews.title: As good as you’d expect for a tiny speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound out of this lil thing. Decent battery life of several hours and no problems connecting, as long as you’re in the same room (not a fantastic range). I find it’s more resonant if I put it facing out from a corner....sounds bounce off the wall and are richer. I use it when I clean and for audiobooks and game nights. Color is pretty and matches my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Rosko

customer_reviews.title: WHAT THE HELL BOSE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on Dec 10, 2015 and as of April 15, 2016, 4 months later, the unit no longer holds a charge. I use it occasionally to play children's music for my son when he's in the living room, and that's about it. I don't abuse this product at all. About a month before the unit died, I noticed there were connectivity issues as well and that's where it started going downhill. I am terribly disappointed in the quality and expected more from Bose. I contacted Bose's customer service so we'll see where this goes. I am questioning whether I should buy anything from Bose ever again
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t read any reviews before purchasing this speaker, but I’ve had it for about 3 weeks, and it has been fantastic. The sound is very clear and loud, for the speaker being quite a small size, I think it will hold up fine. I did end up buying a separate charger for it, which is working just fine so far. I recommend the speaker, it’s pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: short battery life
customer_reviews.text: The speaker worked great and has a very clear sound to it. However because the battery has died after less than 15 months of actual use (purchased as Christmas gift) I can only give it 3 stars. Use was on average only a couple times a week means that after about 150 times and aproximately 75 or less charges it failed to hold a charge. Now I must try to find if I can even replace the battery. hopefully a quality battery can be purchased if it can even be replaced by a purchaser and if it can be found at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Dead after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about 6 months. It has died. It won't hold a charge anymore...even when it's plugged. It also wouldn't pair occasionally before this, so that should I have been my first clue. Total waste of money. It makes me wonder if the rest of the reviews are written after 6-9 months like most of the bad ones are...or right after receiving a brand new speaker. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: mariann alexander

customer_reviews.title: No plug in power supply....only comes with USB cord.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little Bose speaker. The sound quality is amazing! I only give it 4 stars because I am dissapointed that it comes with ONLY the USB cord, not the power supply to plug in.....which is needed to charge if you don't have USB available. I purchased this same speaker two years ago for my business and it DID come with a power supply at that time. I think it's kind of a cheap shortcut on behalf of Bose...really....how much extra would it cost to include this?
customer_reviews.author: caligirl

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Charging and Working
customer_reviews.text: First off, the sound coming out of this speaker is strong, considering the size of this unit. Great bass and treble for the price. The bad, it stopped charging and working in 3 months. Mind you, it has only been charged about 5 times since December. This makes me question the durability of Bose's products. The company will be replacing my device. Maybe I was just one of the unlucky ones who received a lemon. My Big Jambox has yet to fail me after 3 years...
customer_reviews.author: O. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Muddy sound
customer_reviews.text: A mixed bag. I love the wireless speaker concept, and the physical design is very nice. Bluetooth pairing is no problem, and I guess the voice feedback is convenient. The minuses are that the battery doesn't seem to hold a charge for as long as I would expect, and the real disappointment is the sound quality. Sounds muddy and bass-heavy to me (no tone control). It does matter where you place it - close to a well is worse than unobstructed. This may be as good as you get in a small wireless single speaker - I don't have anything to compare with. I've had other desk top wired speakers that sounded way, way better.
customer_reviews.author: D. Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Battery Trouble - Try a Better Cable
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker but it comes with a terrible charging cord. Micro USB sucks in general and this one is really bad. I tried 3 or 4 cables and had limited success. This one -  - has been working 100% for a few months so it might be worth a try if you're stuck. A friend of mine who bought the speaker (on my recommendation) had the same problem and it worked for him too.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, short use on a charge.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my wife. I received a blue one on 3/22 and it seemed OK. It would play for about 2 hours on a full charge. This one would only play for about an hour on a full charge and I was going to return it, but my wife can have it plugged in while using so we kept it. The blue one now will only hold a charge for about 2 hours whether you play it or not. These speaker live up to the Bose sound reputation, but the batteries and charging systems are not goo.
customer_reviews.author: cybershal

customer_reviews.title: BOSE you did it!
customer_reviews.text: (Be respectful of your neighbors, this little speaker can get really loud). Unboxed it, plugged it up, followed simple instructions, paired it to my phone with ease. (NOTE)....for the first pairing, you need to be really close to the speaker for it to catch the blue tooth signal. SOUND quality is excellent. (NOTE).....If you're playing an old song that hasn't been remastered yet, the sound may not be as clear as music recently released in 20__. I charged it overnight, by morning it was ready to go! Best thing since sliced Bread ! Go get one!!!
customer_reviews.author: THE KING has left the building!!

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, but won't hold a charge after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in 2016. Had some defective issues and Bose replaced it free of charge while it was still under warranty in 2017. Now 2 years later, the speaker won't hold a charge. It still works if it's plugged it, but that takes away the portability of the speaker. However, the sound is fantastic and Bose was awesome to work with when we had to get it replaced under the warranty. So, final rating is 3 out of 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: momof5

customer_reviews.title: Speaker sounded good when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Speaker sounded good when it worked, for the first two times I used it. I read a few negative reviews on amazon mentioning how it didn't hold a charge or just simply stopped turning on. I thought to myself, I hope this doesn't happen to me. I went to turn on my speaker and it had no response. Mind you my battery was fully charged. Amazon was great with making my return easy, I wouldn't suggest buying lower end bose speakers. I still have faith in the bose name, just not impressed at all with this specific product. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: David Rubio

customer_reviews.title: but overall a good product and doesn't vibrate off of my shower stall ...
customer_reviews.text: A littly bassy, but overall a good product and doesn't vibrate off of my shower stall door when I am listening to it in the shower. I am worried about the mini USB connector on it right now because it feels a little loose and doesn't have that tight fit like many of the other products that I have around the house that use that style of connector.
customer_reviews.author: delo609

customer_reviews.title: Poor charging cord design
customer_reviews.text: Pro 1. Great sound 2. Small and easy to take anywhere. Con 1. The design for charging the speaker is extremely poor and broke just after one year of use. This is not a random flaw as I have had 2 of these speakers with the same issue. When the first one stopped charging I thought it was because my children were too rough with it. When I got the second one we had a rule that the kids were not allowed to touch the speaker and the charging connection STILL broke. I would never buy this speaker again.
customer_reviews.author: Slidet22

customer_reviews.title: Bose Is Quality - Update: Not So Sure
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It's easy to set up with blue-tooth enabled devices, and it produces a great sound. I bought a second one in white for my husband to use with his laptop. No cables and great sound for the videos he likes to play! Update 12/17/2018: This speaker worked well until recently. It works fine when plugged in, but it no longer holds a charge. Part of the reason I purchased it was for the portability. Doubtful that I'll purchase another. I'll just use it as is. I'm not sure how my husband's is working. He hasn't lodged any complaints, but he doesn't use it very often.
customer_reviews.author: S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Little Speaker Packs A Punch
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a speaker that could be portable but still have good sound quality when listening to music on a higher volume while I’m cooking. Let me say this speaker has been AMAZING. Only had to charge it once so far and it’s been about 2 weeks with daily use. The sound quality is perfect and has great bass even when turned to full blast. I’m truly impressed and am so glad I bought this as it’s met and exceeded every expectation.
customer_reviews.author: G. Litzinger

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this Bose speaker very much at first. However it only made it a little over two years before the battery started discharging when it wasn't being used and now it won't stay connected to my phone over Bluetooth. I haven't abused the speaker, it's barely been outside but a few times. It mostly stays upstairs in my house. Very disappointing for a Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality and design
customer_reviews.text: I tried a couple other Bluetooth speakers before this one and wasn't satisfied with the sound quality, I returned them. The Bose cost significantly more, but it's worth it. Great bass, clear sound for voice and music, and it has held up for 3 years already of nearly daily use. The battery holds a charge a decent amount of time. I also like the case, it's tough and can take some knocking around.
customer_reviews.author: ahilltopper

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies and non replaceable.Pretty much useless product after a while.
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies in about 12 month and non replaceable. There are number of site suggested how to replace batter on this device, but of rt. money Bose charges they can make better product. YOU can cheaper product with replaceable battery with about the same sound. I always knew that Bose is just a hype, and this purchase proves it. This was my last Bose product. Regarding of quality of the sound it is so-so. Too much base (good for the rap-crap though) and not enough middle. I owe not recombined it.
customer_reviews.author: gregd

customer_reviews.title: DOESN'T HOLD A CHARGE
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in June 2015. Have less than 100 hours of use on it, and it has not been damaged or exposed to the elements. It NO LONGER HOLDS A CHARGE. It will only work when plugged in. I bought it for the convenience of not needing to be plugged in all the time, so very disappointing. The sound is very good for a bluetooth speaker, but even so, I would not recommend or purchase this again. Bose/Amazon, you want to step up and make this right? UPDATE: I don't know how or why, but it is holding a charge again.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L.

customer_reviews.title: Best portable speaker...EVER
customer_reviews.text: Trends go in, trends go out, Bose will be there, with no doubt.( why didn't I listen to this phrase from the get go?) For real this speaker is AWESOME. I have always had Bose headphones and tried beats and many others but nothing even come close to the Bose headphones. So when looking for a small portable speaker for beaches, pools, bonfires I searched and really looked into lots of models. Bought a JBL,Beats, Amazon Tap. Returned all of them and ended ordering this. WOW, for being so small and having the quality of sound and bass was INSANE. Bose outdid themselves on this speaker and is incredibly priced.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Tin Sounding
customer_reviews.text: It's barely OK. They really are just trading off the Bose name now. Trying to attach it to anything they can. There are MUCH BETTER bluetooth speakers you can get for less money. Every time I need to attach the cord for charging it is a frustrating experience. It's like the cord is 1 billionth of an inch bigger than the slot. So it's a fight every time I need to charge it.
customer_reviews.author: Monchichipox

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works with little fuss, and sounds great. Bose comes through again.
customer_reviews.text: We actually returned it and got a white one, but (aside from the color caveat) it is great! My wife who hates dealing with electronic gear loves it! She particularly appreciates the feature that it can connect to two devices. That way she has a high-quality external speaker for her PC, and can listen to audiobooks on her iPhone. And it does it seamlessly, which makes my life much easier. Can't recommend it highly enough. I'm actually thinking of getting a second one. Between this and her Bose sound-cancelling headphones, we're bonafide Bose fans.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker better than the newer versions they released!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a couple years ago during a Christmas sale and it is still kicking and doing well 3 years later! Battery life is still good. Audio sounds is the same as when I purchased it. To be honest I love this design and color more than the newer Bose Soundlink colors. They changed up the colors and body and it’s all meh. These are better looking and the turquoise/teal color is hip. Have yet to run into a problem with this little guy! I haven’t read up too much about the features but I discovered you can still use speech commands from your phone while it’s connected to the speaker. Pretty gucci.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Spies

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and portability
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate the reviews on this product because it helped my husband and I make a better decision and to save money! We were set to purchase the Bose Mini Bluetooth speaker, but after reading the reviews we realized that the SoundLink would be the better choice for us. We mainly wanted a speaker that we could take outside at home as well as on vacation, and this one is lighter weight and more portable than the Mini...and currently $60 less in price. We also found the semi-hard carrying travel case for a measly $8 and it has worked out great for us. As always, the richness of sound from Bose is unmatched. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kel T.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this little speaker. Only used it twice but am looking forward to using it more often. Very easy to pair up with all my devices. Very nice sound. Loud enough for me but wish I could see a volume level..the push buttons don't let you know how high/low it is when you first turn it on or up/down. Had a bit of an issue trying to get it to work while it is not plugged in/charging but think that was due to it not being charged up to full power. It seems to be working good now that it's had a couple of days to charge.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely loved this Bose Soundlink Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this Bose Soundlink Bluetooth Speaker. The sound quality is amazing and I use this speaker for almost everything from listening my music to surfing on YouTube via my iPad. I love the portability and ease of use. I take it along with me in the bathroom when I'm showering, I turn it on when I'm on the treadmill, etc. It is so easy to sync up to your smartphone and takes less than 1 minute. I actually purchased 2 more as Christmas presents for my husband and son - a blue one and another black one. My husband was looking for one he could take outside. Again, this speaker is AMAZING! Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: MoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great sound before it started crackling.
customer_reviews.text: A year in. It began crackling intermittently. I thought it was the Bluetooth connection maybe. Now it’s 4 years in and it won’t stop crackling. No matter what is connected to it. Disappointing for a Bose speaker. It doesn’t leave the house so it wasn’t travel damage. It just started and progressed. It’s a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: O’AmyLynn

customer_reviews.title: Gave Me Chills!
customer_reviews.text: The sound is so amazing it Gave me chills the first time I played music on it - instrumentals are fantastic, and so many different titles can be downloaded through Amazon Prime. I even listen to my library's audible book downloads Very happy with this purchase - now I'm thinking of getting one for my daughter for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela J.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is so cute. It has the same awesome bose quality, it’s even got pretty good bass for such a little speaker. The color options are fun and the size makes it easy to store and very portable. You can only pair 2 devices to it, which was a slight downfall for me as we have a few cells phones and ipads in the house, and I would prefer to listen to the music through the speaker than the ipad. Pairing is easy and it holds its battery for quiet a while. The controls are user friendly and the directions are simple and to the point.
customer_reviews.author: HeartReviews

customer_reviews.title: one star
customer_reviews.text: Today my Bose speaker just quit working and wont even take a charge. We are just 2 months short of owning it 1 year and find out the warranty Amazon offered ended 30 days after we bought it. That is terrible coverage coming from a both companies that can clearly afford to replace their defective product. I also read that this speaker only charges 300 times before it is throw away. That should be posted on the box and first item in the details. I couldnt be more disappointed in Bose and now Amazon. I wont buy a Bose bluetooth speaker again
customer_reviews.author: PaulieGirl615

customer_reviews.title: GREAT purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We've owned the Bose Mini SoundLink for the past couple of years and have convinced several others to purchase one as well. But one dreadful day it simply stopped working. Boo! Now here's the good news: we replaced it with THIS sweet speaker. Big improvement!! The Bose lady actually talks to you and tells you which device you're linked to (and we have it linked to at least 6). Sound quality is equal to the Bose Mini but costs about 50 dollars less - at least when we bought it. And the mint color looks great! You already know Bose is superior to everything else. Just go ahead and buy this NOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Dr.P

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth connectivity is better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth connectivity is better than expected: it knows we've got more than one device (iPhone 6s's), and we can play from any one of them without having to go through the whole pairing process over again. (I remember when Bluetooth speakers came out initially, we could only pair one device to it at a time...that no longer seems to be the case). The range is okay. It works almost perfectly as long as the phone is in the same room as the speaker. Get more than 25 feet away and there are the occasional stutters, which are always annoying when listening to music. Sounds quality is great - just what I expect from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who was using her iPhone to play music in the bathroom/while she worked out/ cooked/etc. I did tons of research and knew she would appreciate a quality sounding speaker over speakers with tons of functions she wouldn't really care about (ability to answer calls, waterproof, etc.). I settled on this speaker because of the purported sound quality and the price. It was a great choice. The speaker really sounds great. It's got a warm loudness to it that's just cool. My wife loves it so far. It was super easy to connect and it's a great portable size to transport between rooms. Very satisfied with the quality to price of this speaker so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome little product that really exceeds expectations
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome little product that really exceeds expectations. One buyer did put time and effort into making the case for the product (basically, "it's not supposed to replicate a $1500 product that you have for home use"). I opted to buy it and give it a chance: it has not disappointed. The sound quality and portability are fantastic, and I take the speaker with me outdoors all the time. I have traveled with it and it hardly occupies space. Music at all times is important for me and with this product I certainly have that flexibility..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cant turn off the voice
customer_reviews.text: this speaker will not stop talking or making loud beeps (messing with any setting for the latter) supposedly there is a way to turn this off but i havent found it. also it doesnt handle bass very well and last time i used it i had to let its battery run out because it refused to turn off, the whole time constantly shouting "low battery, please charge"
customer_reviews.author: Qwertyzeldar

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good enough to impress a music snob =]
customer_reviews.text: My father is a lifelong audiphile...in every sense of the word. I was a little worried at first that this portable speaker wouldn't be up to his standards, but after a few days of rave reviews, I was so pleasantly surprised. The speaker really lives up to the Bose name,delivering clear, crisp sound with impressive bass for such a small package. My parents use it by their pool and they absolutely love it. The bluetooth receiver works from across the yard and the battery lasts an impressively long time. Overall a great purchase for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Alex M

customer_reviews.title: Lasted exactly 1 year and 5 months
customer_reviews.text: It lasted 1 year and 5 months. Not worth the money in my opinion. I have way cheaper portable speakers that are still kickin after way longer. When it did work, the sound was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy little speaker with great sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these little speakers! I bought this one as a present. Because they kept borrowing mine all the time. These speakers are awesome! I've had mine for about 3 or 4 years now and it's wonderful. Even got it a little wet and once it dried out it was back to normal. If mine ever wears out I'm buying a 2nd one. I'm definately a fan girl.
customer_reviews.author: DigitalConnoisseur

customer_reviews.title: One Bad Ass Speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Rich sound, compact and long battery life after charging. Bose doesn't need me to tout their product but I wanted to put in my two cents on how amazing this speaker is. I leave mine at work, it even fits in the top drawer of my desk when I need to step away and don't want it stolen!! I have only pure love this product and recommend it to anyone who appreciates good acoustics when listening to anything from music to audio books. Highly recommend. It is worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Still Great after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker in 2016 and it still works great! Sound quality is awesome and battery life is still as good as the day we bought it. I also bought one for my mom a year later and hers is going strong as well. Bose is the best but sometimes out of our price range. This little guy is reasonably priced, and is great for everything: Music around the house, music in the backyard, connecting to the sound on your tv, speaker in the wood shop. I will get the same one again if I ever need another!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother for Christmas, and everybody likes it. I bought a jam speaker the year before for her and she went crazy over it, but she got spoiled and wanted something a little bigger and louder, and the first thing that I thought about was bose. After looking at different bluetooth speakers, I chose this one, and I'm happy I did. It's easy to use and set up (at least in my opinon), the sound is nice and clear. The size is perfect for her, it's not too big but not too small. We can put the volume up all the way with hardly any distortion in the sound. If anything changes I will update.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: good start bad ending !!!!  update its working
customer_reviews.text: Sound was good for small speaker. Used it very little in my shop for added sound on my projector. Sunday football and nascar. Well 3 1/2 months later speaker is dead won't play or charge. Just another piece of junk to me now. I have several other bose products and had no problems. To bad this thing turned out to be worthless. After thinking on it I plugged charger into unit and held down power button several seconds. Charging light came on and it fully charged. I am very happy that it is working. I raised my rating from 1 star to 4 I don't know why this glitch happened . But glad it is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: old and in the way

customer_reviews.title: It works best for an active lifestyle because it fits perfectly into ...
customer_reviews.text: I'd rank the Soundlink a 9(for sound) compared to the JBL flip 3. I'd rank the JBL flip 3 an 8.5. I own both and use them for different reasons. The Bose I use primarily for my office and home The JBL goes everywhere with me. It works best for an active lifestyle because it fits perfectly into water bottle holders (my bike and hiking backpack) and has the ability to attach the clip to anything (chain link fence for tennis i.e.)! The Bose is better in my office and in my home as it sits on the counter and blends in much better...
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Replacement policy only 30 days.....  Not good!
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing. I used it 3 times during this month. I finally ran out of battery and it doesn't charge. I tried to return/replace the item (really just want a replacement) and it says I only had 30 days. Electronics should have a longer return/replace policy. I want a manager to contact me. The rating is because of the replacement issue.
customer_reviews.author: D. Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Who are you and what did you do with the Bose I know?
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality does not live up to Bose standards in my opinion. The micro USB port connection seemed loose when I first plugged it in. It seemed odd to me at the time because it's that little thing that you notice but don't really pay too much attention to. Well, that little thing I ignored is a big problem now. I have difficulty charging my speaker. Somethings it will take a charge and sometimes it doesn't. I don't know if it's the time of day or the angle of how I plug in the USB that matters, but it's pretty much useless to me. Now, I'll have to showroom anything Bose before ordering via internet. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: darryd

customer_reviews.title: Solid Little Speaker for Home or On the Go
customer_reviews.text: It's been over (2) years, and this thing still works well. I've had some cheaper Bluetooth speakers, and they all conked out in fairly quick order. This sucker is durable (have packed it and taken to conferences, etc.) and can handle being knocked about. Don't beat it for fun's sake, but if you drop it, it's not the end of the world. Buttons have a nice feel to the touch and are self-explanatory. The minty color is fun and always gets compliments. Like other Bose products I've owned, this has a good, clear sound. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: VoteAudrey

customer_reviews.title: Puts off great sound. But
customer_reviews.text: Puts off great sound. But , this is my second one and the plug the accepts the charging cable is very poor quality and both units I've owned starting acting up and not taking a charge. The charging connector gets damaged because of the poor quality and workmanship of the design of it. Wont' buy again. A friend has same speaker and has to keep it plugged in at all times or it won't charge.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Barry

customer_reviews.title: Speaker will die after 6-8 months
customer_reviews.text: I received this order back in April 2016. Last week, it refused to take a charge. Now, it won't even "play" with it plugged in. I guess I should have listened to the warnings of former reviews: what was an amazing speaker will die after 6-8 months. Feels like I wasted my $$. 😡
customer_reviews.author: LAI

customer_reviews.title: Dynamite in Small Package!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!!!! Not quite the sound of our Bang and Olufesson ( spelling), BUT really a very nice way to play all my tunes from my IPhone!! Note: Directions need to say, Charge fully THEN follow the simple 'setup' prompts. Very easy to setup and pairs beautifully from a good distance to iPhone. Perfect for taking to the beach, boating, outside get togethers, or just sitting inside and enjoying your favorite music!! I researched several months and after reading over 1,000 positive reviews..... Jumped on this great deal!! It's Bose, after all...... One of my best buys ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Coton Lover

customer_reviews.title: Dies after one year
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was great, with great sound and easy to use, until it just up and died one day. I got this for my daughter for Christmas last year (2015). Just over one year later, almost to the day, it completely died. No power, no charge, just a dead plastic brick. Now I'm reading more about this and discovering that this seems to be a common problem. Very disappointed and I won't be replacing it with another Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hoke

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Bose
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is amazing. It's astounding how great the sound quality is in such a small device. It's so easy to transport this speaker all over the different rooms of my house and outside. It's super easy to link to your smartphone. Really simple to charge. It keeps the charge for a long time. It's so small that it's easy to tuck away in a corner somewhere, but the sound quality is still amazing. I actually love this so much I purchased one for a family member as well as my own household. You can't go wrong with Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Endings Homestead

customer_reviews.title: A great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great speaker. Just what I wanted. Clear sound with good bass. Nice range from one end of the apartment to the other. Easy to connect. I wish it had a battery meter. However. It does have a voice command that tells you when it's connected AND when the battery is getting low. That voice command is a really nice feature. I got white as opposed to the other colors, which I thought were a bit too much of a visual distraction. This was a great purchase with the most important aspect being sound. Great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life, range and sound
customer_reviews.text: Battery drains even if you are not using it and have it turned off. You should keep it plugged in. The sound quality is also not very great. I'm playing a device less than ten feet away and it sounds like a broken cd. I had a jawbone that I unfortunately lost which had better sound, range, was lighter, and had better battery life and it was less expensive. I expected more from a Bose product but am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily C. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound Easy Connecting
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound for my ears. Easy to connect and the verbal information given about what you are connecting to is extremely helpful. I connect to either an iPhone, iPad, or iMac. The only problem I have had is with the connection to the iMac. Once in a while I will get a poor connection that garbles in and out to the point that it is unusable. Since that is the only device in which this occurs, I'm thinking it is more likely something with the iMac rather than the speaker. I haven't taken any time to track it down - I just switch devices.
customer_reviews.author: Kir Mar

customer_reviews.title: Bose quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I got this to move back and forth from bedroom to bathroom (relaxing baths). It's great the sound is amazing just what u expect from Bose and I love the color. Very glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Robinson

customer_reviews.title: You Can't Go Wrong with BOSE!
customer_reviews.text: We (my family) has been buying Bose products for years. I have never been disappointed. Love this SoundLink. Not too much bass so you are not disturbing neighbors or clients; great sound (like there's a Bose with lousy sound); portable. Recommend charging the night before you are ready to take it out and plan on recharging. I work in homes and don't like to wear headphones because I like to be alert when I'm out. The bose let's me do that. So far the only Con: Battery life can be improved. If you're going to use ALL day (6 to 12 hours), Take you're charger with you.
customer_reviews.author: Deena

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless speaker ever
customer_reviews.text: I hemmed and hawed about buying this speaker, or another one by bose. I have two other speakers - including an original jawbone - which do not hold a candle to this speaker. I am not an audiofile, but I do appreciate good music a speaker that is loud enough to be heard through my house. This speaker fits that bill to a tee. I'm a school counselor and I bring this to/from work to have quiet music in my office during the day. The color is great as well, it won't be misplaced. Don't waste your time/money on other speakers, just break down and get the Bose.
customer_reviews.author: QueenShannonNinja

customer_reviews.title: Unuseable after port went bad - One Year In
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was hoping I would love this device and I did.... until it wouldn’t charge anymore. One year in and the unit is unusable. The port on the back seems not tight and appears to not make a connection. That is with using it in my bedroom only except for two vacations a year. So it is not an overuse/misuse issue of the plug. I am so disappointed. I have always loved and owned Bose products so I expected a lot more from them. Will call their support line tomorrow and see what they say. It appears to be a well known issue with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Bose fan and this did not disappoint! There is a nice rich sound that comes out of this speaker but it's a compact size. I have taken it almost everywhere with me, to the lake, around bonfires, pool parties and many other places! Very easy to operate and you are able to pair with multiple devices. It also charges very quickly and you can play it while charging and it will gain a charge not just maintain the current battery level. The charger is the same one that I use for my Android phone. If you want a compact speaker you can take just about everywhere that sounds great - you've found it!
customer_reviews.author: Beaker07

customer_reviews.title: Portable, attractive, affordable
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth about getting one of these since we have several means of listening to music in the house already. The deciding factor was it's portability and size which makes it very easy to travel with. We now use it everyday. The battery life is so-so but it is very easy to use and has great sound considering it's size. I've had several Bose products in the past and seem to think they are overrated and overpriced but I think they got it right with the Soundlink.
customer_reviews.author: thehabes

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: My son has had one for a year and hubby kept stealing it so I bought him one too. Great sound and SUPER sturdy. The little.kids have dropped the old one several times and it still sounds perfect. If you buy - get this case: BOVKE(TM) for Bose Soundlink Color Wireless Bluetooth Speaker Hard EVA Shockproof Carrying Case Storage Travel Case Bag Protective Pouch Box The case is perfect and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Nic

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit nervous about this speaker after reading a few of the negative reviews, but I am really enjoying this speaker. It's portable and lasts a long time. The sound is really good for this price range. I don’t expect it to sound as good as those speakers that are more than double the price, but this is pretty good! I am also really pleased with how quickly it connects with several different types of devices via the bluetooth. I would recommend this speaker!
customer_reviews.author: bish-nm

customer_reviews.title: GREAT IDEA FOR SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! Sound quality is excellent, it charges up fast and lasts long, and it's portable. Sons use it outside with friends, in their rooms, and in bathroom while taking a shower because there's no plugs to worry about (NOTE: THEY DO NOT PUT IT IN SHOWER. It is not waterproof).
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Fox

customer_reviews.title: Sound: GREAT! Charge port Longevity, not so much.
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound quality. Its a Bose: it's going to sound GREAT. Moving on to durability: I have about 4 different Bluetooth speakers ranging from $30 to this Bose. They all have their place, but this Bose FAILED on the charging jack. It comes loose easily, making it difficult to charge. For the quality of Bose, and the price paid, I expect it to outlast the $30 special. It did not. Conclusion: Beautiful sound, so good I bought two. Then the charge ports connection failed. :-(
customer_reviews.author: S. Gittens

customer_reviews.title: new look same great sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker almost every day. It is lightweight and compact so it travels easily from the bedroom to the kitchen. It syncs up quickly to my Apple devices. I love the fact you can sync multiple devices vs the Beats pill that only allows one. I can easily switch between playing music from my phone or from my iPad. The sound quality is great but it is especially nice listening to podcast or talk radio, everything remains clear even as you turn the volume up. The charge also last for a pretty long time, I usually only charge it once a week
customer_reviews.author: SDS

customer_reviews.title: excellent speaker - I purchased 3 for Christmas - one ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, excellent speaker - I purchased 3 for Christmas - one for myself and 2 for family members. I'm using it with my IPhone 6s/Pandora. Super easy set-up - plug in/turn on, tap the + for English, click to connect with Bluetooth on phone - literally took me 15 seconds - I'm 55 and not a tech wizard :) Wonderful sound - family have commented that it sounds like a much bigger sound system - Bose quality did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Loxie

customer_reviews.title: Here's your gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift for my daughter. She absolutely loves everything about it. It's quite obviously conveniently portable, easy to operate, quick to charge and as with all Bose products, has amazing sound quality. This little speaker is great by the pool, perfect for tailgating and picnics, dorm rooms and bedrooms, and an all around great gift for every man, woman and young adult who enjoys listening to high quality sound.
customer_reviews.author: Michele O'Toole

customer_reviews.title: Great up to 80%
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a birthday present for my son but I had to "test" out the sound before wrapping it up. I tested it in our "great room," kitchen + dining + family room and above 80%, the sound was very tinny. However, the sound is solid up to 75-80% but above that the only volume that increases is the treble. As this is for my son's room, ~100 sq ft, that is good as I don't want him cranking up the volume and damaging his ears. But if you plan on playing it at 100% all/most the time and you like to hear balanced music, you may want to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Bose SoundLink Color Bluetooth Speaker (Black)
product_meta.description: Color:Black| Style:Bluetooth SpeakerIf music is your motivation, wait until you hear the Bose Sound Link Color Bluetooth speaker. It plays your favorite tunes from your favorite Bluetooth device—out loud in clear, full audio—just about anywhere you want to go. It's small, durable and simple to use. And it comes in a spectrum of colors to match almost any style. The Sound Link Color speaker suits your active, mobile lifestyle. The body is constructed of durable materials, and its rounded, compact shape fits easily into your bag or backpack. The Sound Link Color speaker has a range of about 30 feet, so you can enjoy your music out loud, without wires. It pairs with your smartphone, tablet or other Bluetooth device. Voice prompts talk you through Bluetooth pairing, making it simple. And the speaker remembers the eight most recent devices you've used, so reconnecting is even easier. The speaker can connect to two Bluetooth devices at the same time, letting you switch between them quickly—when the first device stops playing, the second can start. The Sound Link Color speaker lets you play your music wherever you are, whatever you're doing. It's compact and light enough (1.25 pounds) to take along even when you're traveling light. The speaker is designed for ease of use. It features power, volume and source buttons. You control other functions from your Bluetooth device. Don't let the Sound Link Color speaker's small size fool you. It may be compact, but it delivers a satisfying listening experience. Proprietary technologies and a unique design produce clear, well-balanced, full-range sound. More features: Auxiliary input enables you to connect to other audio sources, like a tablet or MP3 player, Charges with most USB power sources or the included wall charger and Micro USB port allows for charging and software updates. What's in the box: Sound Link Color Bluetooth speaker, Wall charger and Cable.
feature_bullets: Clear, full-range sound you might not expect from a compact speaker
Voice prompts make pairing your devices easier than ever
Up to 8 hours of music from rechargeable lithium-ion battery
Wireless connection to your smartphone, tablet or other Bluetooth-enabled device

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars8,496 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #1,222 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#9,534 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
